articles.description: The former boxer exited the competition after failing to share information about his fellow contestants during an interrogation in the final episode of the Channel 4 programme
articles.content:
Celebrity SAS: Who Dares Wins viewers have praised Tony Bellew for being honest after he was eliminated from the programme.
The former boxer exited the competition after failing to share information… [+1240 chars]
